Description: Fragment of tapestry woven textile depicting floral decoration.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Henry Solomon Wellcome (?)
Acquisition notes: Old Wellcome label states: bought at sale at 'P. & S.' [Puttick and Simpson?] on 17 April 1931, lot 34. Price £1.00 (included EA 79422). Wellcome 'check number' 17341 (dated 29 September 1933); 'Accession no.' 104760.
